## Source: ossf-package-analysis (6248cce7fe3e50ce8c9fe940f959d883f287bff1a15d23813fa4dad7f960a486)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@mentoring-services/sdk' @ 10.20.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
